title: Growing in the Solar Energy Market - Small Cap Street
text: Growing in the Solar Energy Market - Small Cap Street   Published on 2015-10-13 10:30:25 Solar3D Due Diligence Report: Growing in the Solar Energy Market - Small... -- NEW YORK, Oct. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- <-   NEW YORK , Oct. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Solar3D, Inc. (NASDAQ: SLTD ) shares closed at $2.85 yesterday, up 2.88%. Trading volume was just over the average at 158,287 shares. SLTD shares spent most of this year trading in the $4 - $5 range and began to soften in late June gradually coming to the current pricing. Our due diligence will show investors in Solar3D, Inc. (NASDAQ: SLTD ) information they need to make investment choices. Get our report at the link below with no cost obligation. Copy and paste to browser may be required. About Solar 3D, Inc. Solar3D, Inc. provides photo voltaic based power systems for the residential, commercial, and agricultural markets in the United States . It also designs, finances, integrates, and manages systems ranging in size from 2 kilowatt for residential loads to multi megawatt systems for larger commercial projects. About Small Cap Street We make the connection between sophisticated investors and high quality public companies. An issuer of reports written by financial analysts who provide a straightforward assessment of the profiled company and have pledged to remain free of influence when writing research reports. They include stocks traded in the NYSE, NASDAQ, and OTCBB exchanges.
